gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 150, Pacers 145
gameRecap.excerpt: Los Angeles records their highest point total of the season to defeat Indiana, 150-145. For Los Angeles, Anthony Davis led the way with 36 points, 16 rebounds, and two steals while aided by Lebron James (26 points, five rebounds, 10 assists), Spencer Dinwiddie (26 points, five assists, two blocks), and Austin Reaves (25 points, five rebounds, eight assists) in the victory. Pascal Siakam finished with 36 points and 12 rebounds with Myles Turner tallying 20 points, five rebounds and two blocks for Indiana in the losing effort. Los Angeles improves to 39-32, while Indiana moves to 40-32 in the loss.
